DOC.brief_summary: Background : Dexmedetomidine alpha 2 adrenergic agonist sedative , anxiolytic , analgesic property . This study design evaluate inhibitory effect preoperative 0.5 μg/kg dexmedetomidine hemodynamic response cause endotracheal intubation elderly patient treat hypertension . Methods : Forty elderly ( ≥ 65 year ) treated-hypertensive patient American Society Anesthesiologists physical status II undergo elective noncardiac surgery randomly assign two group . Group C receive normal saline group D receive 0.5 μg/kg dexmedetomidine intravenously 10 min endotracheal intubation . Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) , mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) heart rate ( HR ) record preoperatively ward , immediately study drug administration , 1 , 3 , 5 minute endotracheal intubation .
DOC.brief_title: Use Preanesthetic Dexmedetomidine Elderly , Treated-hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiologists physical status II Scheduled elective noncardiac surgery Being treat antihypertensive medication Endotracheal intubation attempt twice Morbidly obese ( BMI > 35 kg/m2 )
